mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sns_activity where 1 = 1
ORDER BY add_Time DESC

SELECT sa.* FROM sns_activity AS sa WHERE 1 = 1
and sa.`delete_status` = 0
AND limit 0,#{count}
Order By sa.add_Time DESC
Order By sa.id
Order By sa.id DESC
Order By sa.priority DESC
